actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Automobile Information Disclosure Act to require disclosure with respect to pickup trucks and farm tractors.

summary.text: Requires disclosure with respect to pickup trucks and farm tractors under the Automobile Information Disclosure Act. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1231)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Automobile Information Disclosure Act to require disclosure with respect to pickup trucks and farm tractors.
